page.title: 17EDUCATION - SCHOOL & BEYOND
page.content: At the school are two full-time members of staff, one with overall responsibility for the school, and specific responsibility for Juniors (8-11 years), and his assistant, with specific responsibility for Reception and Infants (4-7 years). Also there is a caretaker, a midday supervisor and there are three cooks. There are also visiting music and remedial teachers. When children reach secondary school age (11) they have to go out of the area to a school at Dalston (6 miles). There is a CofE Sunday School (2 Catholics attend), held in the church every week, and has about 20 children, aged from 2 to 12 years. A playschool meets every week in the village hall, for pre-school children (birth-age 4), and has a roll of 15-20 children.
